entry.string: Userpoints is a Xaraya Utility Module.
It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
The userpoints module is a utility module that allows you to add a score for level of participation of your users. Users earn points based on what type of content they submit.
From the Modules Administration configure the userpoints hook with any content module that you would like to count score for.
There are no included blocks at this time.
The userpoints hook is a display hook to allow content modules to score points.
Further information on the Userpoints module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Userpoints found at
